Buttons¶

class button.ButtonSensor(digital_Pin: pyb.Pin)¶

Single channel Bump Sensor class

Initializes a single Bump Sensor Object

Parameters:

digital_Pin – Digital input pin for a single bump sensor

check() → bool¶

Checks if the bump sensor is pressed

Returns:

False if the bump sensor was pressed, True otherwise

Return type:

bool

digital_pin¶

Initializes the output Pin for a bump sensor

class button.ButtonArray(button_list: list[pyb.Pin])¶

Button Sensor Array

Initializes a Button Sensor Array Object

Parameters:

button_list – List of digital pins for an array of bump sensors

read_all() → bool¶

read all bump sensors in the array

Returns:

False if just one bump sensor in the array was pressed, True otherwise

Return type:

bool

sensor_list¶

List of button sensors in the array

MECHA03 ROMI
